items.summary: Generate a Van Gogh-inspired background image with vibrant, swirling colors and brushstroke textures suitable for a homepage hero section (dimensions: 1920x1080)

Create a new unified HomePage component that replaces the existing HomePage, featuring a Van Gogh-inspired design with CSS effects for swirling brushstrokes and vibrant color gradients overlaying the generated background image

Implement three prominent main menu options in a center or top panel on the homepage: 'Browse Books' (navigates to /browse), 'Mood-Based Recommendations' (expands content on homepage), and 'Trending & Popular' (expands content on homepage)
Add a secondary menu with links to Collection, Upload Book, My Books, and Favorites, integrated into the homepage design below or beside the three main options
Ensure the homepage serves as a central entry point and personalized dashboard for logged-in users, showing personalized content in the expanded sections when available
Style the homepage typography to stand out clearly against the Van Gogh-inspired background, using consistent font choices and spacing that maintain readability while complementing the artistic theme

Update the App.tsx routing to direct users to the new unified homepage as the default route, ensuring it replaces the current HomePage while maintaining access to PersonalizedHomePage logic for authenticated users
